Here‚Äôs a snapshot of what I‚Äôve been building‚Äîmixing machine learning, app development, AR/VR, and teaching experiments. Each project tells a story about learning, creating, and exploring new tech.  

---

Built a CNN to classify brain tumors from MRI images. Learned the full pipeline: preprocessing, model training, and evaluation.  
[View Notebook](https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1CFKT3GySUWV0MlrqxT6yXKcLVuLWxpSG?usp=sharing)  

---

### 2. üòä Sentiment Analysis (Python, Teaching Project)  
Taught students how to classify text sentiment with Python. Learned about text preprocessing, supervised learning, and model evaluation‚Äîall while having fun!  
[GitHub Repo](https://github.com/kirtigupta1219/Sentiment-Analysis)  

---

### 3. üé≤ Multiplayer Ludo Game (Python, Teaching Project)  
Guided students in building a server-client multiplayer Ludo game. Taught networking, socket programming, and game logic for turn-based fun.  
[GitHub Repo](https://github.com/kirtigupta1219/Python-Multiplayer-Ludo-Game)  

---

### 4. üìö Book App ‚Äì React Native (Play Store Project)  
Helped a student create a mobile book browsing app in React Native, now live on Play Store. Students learned UI, navigation, and app deployment.  
[Try it on Android](https://snack.expo.dev/@kirtigupta02458/book-app?platform=android)  

---

### 5. üõ∞Ô∏è ISS Tracker ‚Äì React Native (Teaching Project)  
Built an app to track the International Space Station in real-time. Students learned API integration and interactive app design.  
[Interact Here](https://snack.expo.dev/@kirtigupta02458/iss-tracker)  

---

### 6. üî´ 3D Shooting Game (A-Frame, GitHub Project)  
Created a first-person 3D shooting game using A-Frame. Learned 3D modeling, physics, and interactivity in VR environments.  
[GitHub Repo](https://github.com/kirtigupta1219/3D-Shooting-Game)  

---

### 7. ‚è∞ Invisible Cloak (Python, GitHub Project)  
A Python project that creates an invisibility effect using your webcam. When a red cloth is held up, it appears as if you vanish from the camera view, demonstrating real-time video processing and color masking techniques.  
[GitHub Repo](https://github.com/kirtigupta1219/Invisible-Clock)  

---

### 8. ‚å®Ô∏è Virtual Keyboard & Mouse (Python, GitHub Project)  
Simulated keyboard and mouse using computer vision. Students explored image processing, Python libraries, and innovative interaction techniques.  
[GitHub Repo](https://github.com/kirtigupta1219/Virtual-Keyboard-Mouse)  

---

### 9. ‚öõÔ∏è AR Chemical Bond (AR, Teaching Project)  
Created an AR tool to visualize chemical bonds. Students interact with molecules in 3D, making chemistry lessons immersive and fun.  
[GitHub Repo](https://github.com/kirtigupta1219/AR-Chemical-Bond)  

---

### 10. üèãÔ∏è BMI Calculator (Python, GitHub Project)  
Developed a Body Mass Index calculator in Python. Students learned formulas, user input handling, and project structure.  
[GitHub Repo](https://github.com/kirtigupta1219/BMI-Calculator)  

---

## üîç Explore More   
Most of my other experiments, projects, and teaching resources live on my [**GitHub profile**](https://github.com/kirtigupta1219?tab=repositories). Feel free to browse!
